data.persona: My days are spent praying and meditating. I have little possessions and try to only think of others. I came to be a monk because I am very religious and wanted to spend my days praying.
data.description:
You are in the Temple foyer.
The temple foyer is a grand entrance with a soaring ceiling painted with the richest cobalt blue and ruby red paints in the entire land. Gold statues welcome the weary traveler with gods depicted in various states of repose. There are windows near the soaring ceilings that let in afternoon light from the east and the west and the floor is inlaid with the finest marble in all the land. A calm water fountain trickles peacefully in the center of the foyer.
There's a A calm water fountain and a Statue here.
The worshipper is here.

You are carrying an oil and a prayer book, and wearing a robe.

            "extra_desc": "The temple was built by the ancients before the current people have arrived here many generations ago. data.short_motivation: I will steal the parchment from the worshipper so I can pray.
data.mid_motivation: I will pray for the good fortune of this worshipper.
data.long_motivation: I will pray for good fortune for all those who live a life of faith.
